DOC.brief_summary: The primary purpose study help answer whether tadalafil take day help improve psychological outcome ( sexual self confidence , spontaneity time concern ) compare sildenafil take needed patient erectile dysfunction ( ED ) .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Patients With Erectile Dysfunction Test Whether Tadalafil Taken Once Day Can Better Improve Psychological Outcomes .
DOC.criteria: History erectile dysfunction ( ED ) . Have satisfactory response tadalafil , sildenafil citrate , vardenafil HCl period least 6 month expect frequent use ( least one dose per week , average ) administer need . Have never use tadalafil 5 mg 2.5 mg day therapy . Anticipate adult female sexual partner willing participate study . Agree make least four sexual intercourse attempt first four week study . Agree use treatment ED ( even herbal treatment ) study . Agree follow direction give study doctor staff use study drug . Have primary sexual disorder present penile deformity . Have history radical prostatectomy penile implant . Have problem kidney , liver , nervous system . Have uncontrolled diabetes , measure blood test haemoglobin A1C great value 11 % . Are treated heart disease drug call nitrate ( example , nitroglycerin ) . Have chest pain ( call unstable angina angina ) require treatment . Have heart disease cause symptoms exert . Have follow past 90 day : Heart attack , also know myocardial infarction ( MI ) ; Heart bypass surgery ( call coronary artery bypass graft surgery ) ; Had procedure open blood vessel heart know angioplasty stent placement ( percutaneous coronary intervention ) . Have history loss vision one eye nonarteritic anterior ischemic optic neuropathy ( NAION ) . Have retinitis pigmentosa . Have history human immunodeficiency virus ( HIV ) . Have high low blood pressure ( study doctor discuss limit ) . Have stroke significant injury brain spinal cord within last 6 month . Have rare hereditary problem galactose intolerance , Lapp lactase deficiency glucosegalactose malabsorption Lactose intolerance . Have schedule plan surgery require anaesthesia course study . Have schedule cataract surgery curse study .
